webPage.name: Social Media Recruiting & Scheduling | Flowxtra UK
webPage.description: Plan, approve, and publish employer branding content for the United Kingdom from one Flowxtra calendar. Coordinate hiring posts across LinkedIn, Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, and WhatsApp while staying GDPR compliant.

mainEntity.name: Can Flowxtra handle UK time zones and holidays?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes. Schedule campaigns using UK-friendly calendars, bank holiday reminders, and LinkedIn peak engagement windows.

mainEntity.name: How are approvals managed for distributed UK teams?

acceptedAnswer.text: Editors, reviewers, and compliance leads receive notifications, can comment inline, and mark posts as approved before publishing.
